ygData.subject: Re: My exp with the GM Event this weekend
ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t find the event that fulfilling.  Being on a young server, the forces of darkness were truly overwhelming and could not be stopped.  The level 50+ dark
ygData.messageBody:
I didn't find the event that fulfilling. Being on a young server, the
forces of darkness were truly overwhelming and could not be stopped. The
level 50+ dark elf NPCs in high hold killed everyone who went against them
as far as I know. They should really vary the strength of the NPCs
according to the servers that the event is held on.

While I was able to follow the general storyline, I did not find it
compelling or enveloping.

I spent most of my time in Kithcor trying vainly to stop the daughter of
Innoruk. All the NPCs had extremely high magic resistence. I managed to
mesmerize one GM but since he was being constantly attacked it was
pointless (mes kept breaking).

I did however enjoy the post-ascention undead raid on Kithcor. I wish my
party had been better organized we might have got a few kills on the big
NPCs. I also enjoyed the post-raid regular night undead spawns in
kithcor. I helped a bunch of people get some of the cool new weapons that
were dropped there.

- Christina
